thing-type.label: POPE700168 POPP Rain-Sensor
thing-type.description: POPP Rain-Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe POPP Rain-Sensor is a Rain Measuring Sensor Device for Europe</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPut controller in inclusion mode, push the Z-Wave button once</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPut controller in exclusion mode, push the Z-Wave button once</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPush the Z-Wave button once</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: Rain Counter
parameter.description: total count of rain<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThs values shows the total count of rain from the moment of inclusion in mm waterlevel. By writing this value this counter can be reset. Size: 2 Byte, Default Value: 0</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Rain Start Command
parameter.description: Send rain start command to group 2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 2 when the device detects start of rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 99</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Rain Stop Command
parameter.description: Send rain stop to group 2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 2 when the device detects stop of rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 0</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: Meter Multiplier
parameter.description: Adapt the display<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis multiplier allows to adapt the display to certain controllers not being able to handle very low numbers. Size: 2 Byte, Default Value: 1 only 1/10/100/1000</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Heavy Rain
parameter.description: Threshold defines heavy rain condition<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis threshold defines when a heavy rain condition is hit. In most countries this is defined as &gt; 15 mm rain per hour. The default value however is to turn this function off. Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 255</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Heavy Rain Start Command
parameter.description: Send heavy rain start to group 3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 3 when the device detects start of heavy rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 99</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Heavy Rain Stop Command
parameter.description: Send heavy rain stop to group 3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 3 when the device detects stop of heavy rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 0</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Switching Command when Rain (> 0 mm/h)
parameter.description: Switching Command when Rain (> 0 mm/h). Basic Set Comand is sent.

parameter.name: group_3
parameter.label: 3: Heavy Rain detected. Basic Set Comand is sent.
